overview: Ultravox – Vienna (1981) Soft Cell – Tainted Love (1981) Men At Work – Down Under (1982) OMD – Maid Of Orleans (1982) Eurythmics – Sweet Dreams (Are Made Of This) (1983) Culture Club – Karma Chameleon (1983) Talk Talk – Such A Shame (1984) Beastie Boys – Fight For Your Right (1985) Falco – Rock Me Amadeus (1985) Paul Hardcastle – 19 (1985) Simple Minds – Don’t You (Forget About Me) (1985) Bangles – Manic Monday (1986) Run DMC – Walk This Way (1986) Desireless – Voyage, Voyage (1987) John Farnham – You’re The Voice (1987) Rick Astley – Never Gonna Give You Up (1987) Bobby McFerrin – Don’t Worry, Be Happy (1988) Ofra Haza – I’m Nin’Alu (1988) Taylor Dayne – Tell It To My Heart (1988) Tone Loc – Funky Cold Medina (1989) etc...
title: MTV: 20 Years of Pop
